Task_Title: Check the bobbin centering oil level
Steps_Text: Check the oil level in centering device and refill if required
Check the lateral level using the sprat level and adjust  if required

1- Manually check the operation of the shock absorber.
2- if its too smooth replace the oil and if its too hard check the spring and rod
alignment

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for festoon motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain Mobil B2
3- Put the cover back

1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for trimming motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain
3- Put the cover back

1- Check the fixation of trimming blades
2- Change bearing or blades if required

Task_Title: Check the let off tray roller
Steps_Text:
Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

1- Remove old grease
2- Put enough amount of grease on the gear Mobil B2

1- Remove old grease
2- Put enough amount of grease on the rack using Mobil B2

1- Manually check the operation of the shock absorber.
2- if its too smooth replace the oil and if its too hard check the spring and rod
alignment

Test the knife and replace or adjust its clearance using filler if
required

1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

1- Remove cover and check the belt for wear or scratches
2- Change with the same one if required

1- Remove old grease
2- Put enough amount of grease on the rack using Omega 77
Use hand grease gun and lubricate the nipple using Omega 77
Use hand grease gun and lubricate the nipple using Omega 77

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for knife roller motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain Mobil B2
3- Put the cover back

1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

Check the free movement and speed of magnet cylinder up and
down and forward and backward and adjust using the flow regulator
if required

1- Manually check the operation of the shock absorber.
2- if its too smooth replace the oil and if its too hard check the spring and rod
alignment

Check the lateral level using the sprat level and adjust by
adjusting screws if required

1- Check the condition of the old grease
2- Replace it if required using Omega 77

Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Check the stoppage splicer roller lateral level
Steps_Text:
Check the lateral level using the sprat level and adjust by
adjusting screws if required

Task_Title: Check the conditions of the splicing unit
Steps_Text:
1- Check the condition of the splicing gears and replace if required
2- Check the clearance of splicing gears and adjust if required
3- Check splice guide cylinder efficiency and replace if required

Task_Title: Lubricate the splicer guide screw shaft
Steps_Text: Put enough amount of light oil on the screw

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for splicer roller motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain Mobil B2
3- Put the cover back

Task_Title: Check splicer screw motor timing belt
Steps_Text:
1- Remove cover and check the belt for wear or scratches
2- Change with the same one if required

Task_Title: Lubricate the table guide screw shaft
Steps_Text: Put enough amount of grease Mobil B2 on the screw

1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

1- Remove cover and check the belt for wear or scratches
2- Change with the same one if required

1- Take the brushes out
2- clean with solvent , dry it then put it back

Task_Title: Check the myler carriage movement speed
Steps_Text:
Move the carriage in and out and adjust if required using the flow
regulator located on the cylinder both ends

Task_Title: Lubricate the myler carriage centering guide
Steps_Text:
1- Remove all dirt
2- Put enough amount of light grease on centering guide

1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for bobbin motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain Mobil B2
3- Put the cover back

Task_Title: Check the wind up tray roller
Steps_Text:
Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

1- Clean beneath the splicer and knife tray
2- Clean beneath the feeding bobbin
3- Clean the strip area

Use the hand grease gun to lubricate the bearing housing till the
new grease appears around the bearing
